title: My league isnt patching. PLEASE HELP
body: I tried uninstalling it but it work doesnt. It says "Unspecified error occured. Please check logs for more information"

replies.body: I'm here to help, but need just a bit more info.  At what percent are you receiving the unspecified error?

Thanks!  At this phase, the patcher has already finished prepping your game files and is already in the process of downloading updates.  A weak or unstable connection can be causing this error because it's backtracking or getting cut off entirely.  You'll want to go over the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to tune up your network and ensure a smooth update.  I hope that helps!
I tried everything i could, but it still doesnt work. Any more suggestions on how to fix this problem?

Sure!  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so our tech team can work on this with you individually.  Download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) as well for some logs to attach to your ticket.  We'll reply back as soon as we can!
